MAIN_MESSAGE: This is a message for customers in the G74 postcode area of East Kilbride. It is necessary for our engineers to carry out an emergency shutdown at 5pm  to repair a fault on our underground cable network and this may affect the supply to your property. We will work to get your power back on as quickly and as safely as possible by 9pm. We will update this message if this information changes. We apologise for the inconvenience and thank you for your patience. This message was updated at 4:39pm on the 28th of April 2021
